"[Ktlint](https://pinterest.github.io/ktlint/) is used as the linter for this project.

## Integration

[Spotless](https://github.com/diffplug/spotless/tree/main/plugin-gradle#applying-ktlint-to-kotlin-files) is used to integrate ktlint into the project.

The Spotless configuration is defined in a dedicated Gradle script located at:

```
gradle/spotless-init.gradle.kts
```

## Jetpack Compose Rules

[Jetpack Compose Rules](https://mrmans0n.github.io/compose-rules/) is a set of custom ktlint rules designed to help prevent common pitfalls when working with composables. It is used to maintain a healthy Compose implementation.

## Configuration

Ktlint behavior is customized via Spotless using `editorConfigOverride`, rather than relying solely on the `.editorconfig` file. The following options are explicitly overridden in the Spotless configuration:

```kotlin
val editorConfigOverride = mapOf(
 "ktlint_code_style" to "android_studio",
 "ktlint_experimental" to "enabled",
 "ktlint_function_naming_ignore_when_annotated_with" to "Composable,Test",
 "ktlint_standard_class-signature" to "disabled",
 "ktlint_standard_function-signature" to "disabled",
 "ktlint_standard_property-naming" to "disabled",
 "compose_allowed_composition_locals" to "LocalSnackbarHostState",
)
```

In addition, the `.editorconfig` file includes the following Kotlin-related settings:

```ini
[*.{kt,kts}]
ij_kotlin_allow_trailing_comma = true
ij_kotlin_allow_trailing_comma_on_call_site = true
ij_kotlin_imports_layout = *,java.**,javax.**,kotlin.**,^
ij_kotlin_indent_before_arrow_on_new_line = true
```"
